summary: I HAVE A 2002 F250 SUPER DUTY.  WHEN I COME TO A FULL STOP, AND THEN TAKE OFF THERE IS A FEELING THAT SOMETHING IS SLACK IN THE DRIVE TRAIN SOMEWHERE.  YOU CAN FEEL A DOUBLE BUMP KINDA OF FEELING.  WHEN TOWING A TRAILER IT IS WORSE.  THE FORD DEALER SAID SOME TRUCKS DO THIS AND SOME DO NOT, BUT THEY CAN NOT FIND THE PROBLEM, WHICH I BELIEVE THEY THINK IT IS A NORMAL FUNCTION.      *JB
